body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to Starlight Hotels and Resorts. My name is Walter King. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Walter, my name is Judy Sanders.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Judy. Before we proceed, could you kindly provide me with the first three digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Judy. And could you also confirm the last two digits of your home address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for confirming, Judy. Your details will help us provide better assistance. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, thank you. I'm feeling relieved now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Judy. Thank you for your time. If you need any further assistance, don't hesitate to contact us. Have a wonderful day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Walter. Have a great day too!
